export var verifyTokenStarted=function verifyTokenStarted(){var silentAuth=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;return{type:VERIFY_TOKEN_STARTED,payload:{silentAuth:silentAuth}};};//if verify token ends or fails
export var verifyTokenEnd=function verifyTokenEnd(){return{type:VERIFY_TOKEN_END};};//if verify token success

export var userLoginStarted=function userLoginStarted(){return{type:USER_LOGIN_STARTED};};//user login fails
export var userLoginFailure=function userLoginFailure(){var error=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'Something went wrong.
